sentences.sContent: The yolk contains all the fat and approximately half of the protein of the egg.
sentences.sCn: 蛋黄含有鸡蛋中全部的脂肪和大约一半的蛋白质。

sentences.sContent: On some systems the time is a true count of milliseconds, changing approximately every millisecond.
sentences.sCn: 在一些系统上，时间是真正的毫 秒计数，大约每一毫秒改变一次。

sentences.sContent: Do any one of you know approximately how much higher it goes, if this ball has way higher mass than this one?
sentences.sCn: 你们中的任意一个知道它近似高出多少么,如果这个球的质量比这个大的话？

words.tran: [数] 近似法；接近；[数] 近似值

trans.tranOther: used to show that sth is almost, but not completely, accurate or correct
